name: HyTechPro
description:
HyTechPro is a globally recognized software engineering services company. Over the years it has helped its worldwide clientele by developing custom software solutions. HyTechPro specializes in SharePoint technology, Mac technology, Cloud Computing, Mobile/Tablet app development and so on.
HyTechPro also offers many innovative models like its Extended India Team model that allows setting up a development center or office in India without any overhead expenses, managerial headache or infrastructural requirements. Additionally, HyTechPro also offers Remote Infrastructure Management services as well.
Offices: US, UK, Sweden and India
Resources: 200+ developers
Technology Expertise: Microsoft technologies including SharePoint and Silverlight, open source technologies like Java/ J2EE, LAMP, MAC technologies like Cocoa, Carbon, mobile technologies like iPhone SDK, BlackBerry SDK, Android SDK, Eclipse IDE, Objective C, J2ME and more.
Engagement Models: Dual Shore Dedicated Team Model, Fixed Scope-Fixed Cost Model.
Accolades: ISO速 9001:2008 certified, Microsoft速 Partner, Official Apple速 Developer, NASSCOM速 award winner.
